content: Once at the top of the building, be ready for another Overseeing Monk to ambush you, and then head out to the balcony to deal with the lightning mages.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Once at the top of the building, be ready for another Overseeing Monk to ambush you, and then head out to the balcony to deal with the lightning mages.
